summary: A few minor adjustments to the smithing tree for SkyRe users.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is intended for use with [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]SkyRe[/url] v1.3+ games using additional weapon and armor mods.

[u][b]Main version[/b][/u]:
Renames the Nordic Armors perk to Advanced Techniques, adjusts its position in the tree to be central & not stuck midway in the light armor side of the tree, changes the conditions of the perk to require 50 Smithing skill, Leathercraft & Principals of Smithing perks.
Allows the Dragoncraft perk to be taken after taking either the Glass or Daedric perk. You cannot go 'backwards' after taking Dragoncraft.
Adjusts the relative position of perks in the Smithing tree to look a bit better with the changes.

[b][u]Mage version[/u][/b]:
All changes from Main version, but also; Reduces Smithing skill required for Tradecraft and Weaving Mill to 25. Weaving Mill also requires 50 skill in Enchanting and the Apprentice perk in either Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion or Restoration.

[u][b]Why isn't this in the USKRP?[/b][/u]
The USKRP is for bug fixes, and while the position of the Nordic/Advanced perk may be an annoyance, it's not a bug.

Compatibility:
SkyRe
SkyRe + [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791]CCOR[/url]
SkyRe + CCOR + [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629]SCaRP[/url]

Incompatibility:
Anything that isn't SkyRe.
author: Raulfin

files.name: SkyRe Smithing Tree Tweak
files.changelogHtml: Initial release. Moves Nordic Smithing perk out of light armor side of the tree & makes it centered. Allows Dragoncraft to be taken after getting Daedric crafting. Adjusts the relative position of perks in the Smithing tree to look a bit better with the above changes.

files.name: SkyRe Smithing Tree Tweak
files.changelogHtml:
Renamed Advanced Armors perk to Advanced Techniques
Corrected perk conditions on Advanced Techniques, requires 50 Smithing skill, Leathercraft & Principals of Smithing perks.

files.name: SkyRe Smithing Tree Tweak
files.changelogHtml: Changed Glass to require Leathercrafting instead of Advanced Techniques.

files.name: SkyRe Smithing Tree Tweak
files.changelogHtml:
New mage-friendly version.
Reduces Smithing skill required for Tradecraft to 25.
Reduces Smithing skill required for Weaving Mill to 25.
Weaving Mill also requires 50 skill in Enchanting and the Apprentice perk in either Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion or Restoration.
